DESCRIPTION: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site to combine the Gem's effect with this card's effect.

A card in Stasis gains a turn counter equal to its cost plus 1. NL Turn counter is reduced by 1 at the start of your turn. NL When the counter reaches 0, it is returned to your hand and becomes 0-cost until played.
Gems can be placed into Sockets in cards at a Rest Site.
Gain 2 Block when you play a card. NL While in Defensive Mode, you deal 3 damage to attackers.
Wards are #b0 cost Block cards which Exhaust.
Reduce the turn counter of a card in Stasis by 1. If the card now costs 0, return it to your hand.
0-cost Exhausting Attack that deals 5 damage (+2 Upgraded), and places a Sentry Wave on top of your draw pile.
0-cost Exhausting Skill that applies 1 Weak to ALL enemies, draws 1 card (+1 Upgraded), and places a Sentry Beam on top of your draw pile.
0-cost Exhausting Skill that generates three cards inspired by a chosen Construct of the Spire.
Orb Slams are #b0 cost Attack cards which deal damage twice, and Exhaust.
